description:
Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je boucle Edgar et cap sur l`Europe
Let`s Catch Lupin and Go to Europe
Lupin o Tsukamaete Europe e Ikou
Lupin schnappen und dann auf nach Europa!
ルパンを捕まえてヨーロッパへ行こう
